DOC.brief_summary: An observational , non-interventional study social , economic quality-of-life outcome Adalimumab use participant moderate severe active Rheumatoid Arthritis .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Rheumatoid Arthritis Patients Adalimumab Evaluate Quality Life Variables , Effects Work Productivity Functional Outcomes Malaysia
DOC.detailed_description: This study design evaluate adalimumab therapy Malaysia participant ' Quality Life ( QoL ) use non-invasive epidemiological method like Health Assessment Questionnaire - Disability Index ( HAQ-DI ) , Health Assessment Questionnaire Visual Analog Scale ( HAQ-VAS ) , Health Assessment Questionnaire Short Form 36 ( SF-36 ) . The primary objective study evaluate change QoL outcomes anti -TNF naïve Malaysian RA patient 6 month adalimumab treatment . The secondary objective study evaluate change QoL outcomes 1 month 3 month adalimumab treatment ; provide assessment safety tolerability adalimumab anti TNF naïve Malaysian Rheumatoid Arthritis patient .
DOC.criteria: Patients 18 year age old diagnosis Rheumatoid Arthritis least 3 month accord American College Rheumatology ( ACR ) criterion Patients institute anti Tumour Necrosis Factor ( antiTNF ) agents prior inclusion study ( antiTNF naïve patient ) . Only antiTNF Naive Rheumatoid Arthritis patient schedule begin HUMIRA treatment , accord relevant Summary Product Characteristics , basis physician 's judgment ( current clinical practice ) , select inclusion study Patients include clinical/observational trial Patients provide write informed consent enrollment study Refusal participate study sign inform consent Contraindications adalimumab accord term local marketing authorization ( label )
